legislation_term: 'treatment services' do not include treatment services provided to the donor, or to the donor and another person together
legislation_term_definition: "Treatment services" do not include treatment services provided to the donor, or to the donor and another person together" means that for the purposes of section 31ZD, the definition of treatment services is restricted to exclude any fertility treatment or related medical services where the gamete or embryo donor is also a recipient of those same treatment services, either as the sole patient or as one of multiple patients receiving treatment together with another person. This exclusion applies whether the donor receives treatment individually or jointly with a partner, spouse, or other specified person, thereby ensuring that the donor's right to information about resulting children under section 31ZD only applies to scenarios where their donated genetic material is used in treatment services provided exclusively to third parties who are not the donor themselves.
